objectives.en: The aim of the course is to give overview about geographical aspects and effects of the distribution of ICT; to describe main methods of spatial positioning and structure of respective datasets, to introduce using of positioning data in scientific research and development of location based services.
objectives.et: anda ülevaade IKT levikust maailmas, tutvustada selle ühiskondlike mõjude geograafilisi aspekte; kirjeldada peamisi mobiilpositsioneerimise meetodeid, vastavate andmekogude struktuure, positsioneerimisandmete kasutamist teadusuuringutes ning asukohapõhiste teenuste arendamisel.

learning_outcomes.en: By the end of the course the students:
*	Will be able to understand content of ICT geography and key theories
learning_outcomes.et: *	IKT geograafia sisu ja teoreetilisi seisukohti

learning_outcomes.en: *	Understand main effects of ICT on the societal and personal level
learning_outcomes.et: *	Orienteeruvad IKT ühiskondliku ja personaalse taseme mõjudes

learning_outcomes.en: *	Will be able to describe main spatial positioning methods, applications and spatial accuracy
learning_outcomes.et: *	Tunnevad peamisi asukohamääramise meetodeid, nende rakendamist ja täpsust

learning_outcomes.en: *	Are aware of the principles how location based services work and what are the main application areas
learning_outcomes.et: *	Saavad aru asukohapõhiste teenuste toimimise põhimõtetest ja peamistest rakendusvaldkondadest

learning_outcomes.en: *	Will be able to understand privacy and security risks related to the ICT; are aware of legal aspects
learning_outcomes.et: *	Valdavad IKT-ga seotud privaatsuse ja turvariske, on kursis selle õigusliku taustaga

learning_outcomes.en: *	Be knowledgeable with forecasts for the future of ICT
